title: Tag Category
description: This schema defines the Tag Category entity. A Tag Category contains tags called Primary Tags. Primary Tags can further have children Tags called Secondary Tags. Only two levels of tags are supported currently.

javaEnums.name: Descriptive
javaEnums.description: Tag category used for describing an entity. Example - column is of of type User.Address.

javaEnums.name: Classification
javaEnums.description: Tag category used for classifying an entity. Example - column is of of type PII.sensitive.

id.description: Unique identifier of this entity instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this tag category.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Unique name of the tag of format Category.PrimaryTag.SecondaryTag.

description.description: Unique name of the tag category.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to the tag.

usageCount.description: Count of how many times this tag and children tags are used.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

children.description: Tags under this tag group or empty for tags at the leaf level.
